theme: False witnesses did rise up. Psalm 35:11

verses.2025-06-08: The Holy Spirit who brings salvation – Titus 3:5-7, Ephesians 1:13-14, Hebrews 12:2, 2 Corinthians 3:6
verses.2025-06-15: He lifted the poor to sit on the higher throne of glory – 1 Samuel 7:8; 1 Samuel 2:8
verses.2025-06-22: The heart is deceitful above all things – Jeremiah 17:9-11
verses.2025-06-29: God did what Elisha asked – 2 Kings 2:9-15,23-24; 2 Kings 6:18; Matthew 7:7
